title: ICE in rustc_query_impl::on_disk_cache

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
To be perfectly honest I don't know why this happened but I thought I report it anyways since it might help you guys. The reporting notice was to big to just ignore. However, I did not investigate further into the issue. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.0 (2c8cc3432 2023-03-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74 commit-date: 2023-03-06 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.68.0 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 268 but the index is 284', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/on_disk_cache.rs:717:40 [..] thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Illegal read of: 50244', /rustc/2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/dep_graph/graph.rs:447:25 [..] thread panicked while processing panic. aborting. error: could not compile `shared` ```
Backtrace
